text: Jok Richard Church (November 28, 1949 - April 29, 2016) was an American cartoonist. He was born in Akron, Ohio. He created the Universal Press Syndicate comic strip You Can With Beakman and Jax which was later made into the TV series Beakman's World. Church died of a heart attack in San Francisco, California on April 29, 2016, aged 67. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American cartoonists Category:People from Akron, Ohio
title: Jok Church
